author: Home Repair Tutor
description: KERDI-BOARD shower wall tip…these 4 foot by 8 foot boards make waterproofing showers fast. I fasten screws/washers 1 inch off the subfloor and every 12 inches. I also slightly depress the screw/washer so that banding is easier. Any extra pieces can be used for the custom shower curb or niche 🔥many thanks to @schlutersystems1 for partnering with me and making great shower systems for homeowners and installers #schlutersystems #showerremodel #kerdiboard #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: KERDI-BOARD Shower Wall Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #schlutersystems #brandpartner
